units.title: Isolation and preculture of LGR5+ stem cells
units.text: Single LGR5+ intestinal stem cells were isolated via FACS and precultured for 3 days under stem cell maintenance conditions (day 0 seeding, ENR CV days 0–3).
units.rationale: Describes the initial cell isolation and culture step.

units.title: Induction of organoid differentiation
units.text: On day 3, CV was removed from the culture, and organoids differentiated under ENR conditions for up to 3 days.
units.rationale: Specifies the timing and media change to trigger differentiation.

units.title: Daily organoid processing on DisCo
units.text: For each day during development (S0–S3), individual organoids were isolated, dissociated and processed on the DisCo platform.
units.rationale: Outlines the routine sampling and processing workflow.

units.title: Preparation of low‑density cell suspension
units.text: 80 µl of a suspension of 0.02 cells per nl are prepared for dispensing); for Seq-well4, to generate replica molds for chip production.
units.rationale: Provides the exact cell concentration for loading the device.

units.title: Silanization of primary PDMS replica mold
units.text: The PDMS‑based primary replica mold was then silanized and subsequently used to obtain secondary replica molds for PDMS flow layer production.
units.rationale: Details a surface‑treatment step required for mold reuse.

units.title: Fabrication of flow layer
units.text: The flow layer was fabricated using PDMS and curing agent at a ratio of 5:1, degassed and cured at 80 °C for 30 min.
units.rationale: Describes the polymer preparation and curing conditions for the flow channel.

units.title: Fabrication of control layer
units.text: The control layer was fabricated by spin coating the photoresist layer at 650 r.p.m. for 35 s with a 15 s ramp time, followed by baking at 80 °C for 30 min.
units.rationale: Specifies spin‑coating parameters for the control channel.

units.title: Assembly of PDMS layers
units.text: Holes were punched with a 0.5 mm diameter biopsy punch. The two PDMS layers were manually aligned and bonded at 80 °C for at least 60 min.
units.rationale: Covers the mechanical steps to create the final microfluidic chip.

units.title: Impedance‑based cell counting
units.text: We quantified the number of input cells using impedance measurement, which enabled accurate counting of the number of input cells as validated by microscopy (Extended Data Fig. 2f).
units.rationale: Provides a method for precise input cell quantification.

units.title: Species‑mixing validation experiment
units.text: HEK 293T and murine IBA cells were processed with the DisCo workflow for scRNA‑seq, the barcodes merged and the species separation visualized as a Barnyard plot.
units.rationale: Demonstrates a functional test of the platform’s co‑encapsulation accuracy.
